creator: hanasaki@hanaden.com
text:
Enhancement request : pluggable httpsession cache provider

Usable from a config file in an IoC fashion implemented by a Factory for a common interface (like codec providers sha/md5 and jdbc/jndi style)

Looking for a default implementation as it currently is and options for common caching such as:
  jcscache
  OSCache
  WhirlyCache
  SwarmCache
  JBoss Cache
  Open Terracotta
  dynacache (IBM)
Provided via the Manager and/or Store interfaces.
creator: markt@apache.org
